question:
You are due to start a new job next week but you will not be able to because you have some problems. 
Write a letter to your new employer. In your letter
-explain your situation
-describe your problems
-tell him/her when you think you can start
text: I am writing this letter to inform you about my situation which makes it difficult for me to start working next week. I was supposed to join on the 29th of November as an assistant marketing manager, but something came up and I would not be able to join.

Let me explain my circumstances, I was on a vacation with my family in Japan, but  the covid-19  travel restriction made us  quarantine for 14 days in the hotel upon return. I have no choice but to follow the regulation. Moreover, if anyone of us has covid even after idling ourselves from others, we have to do another 14 days of quarantine again.

However, I was thinking that I can begin my job on the 16th of December after I am done with my quarantine. I am hoping that you will consider my request and let me join on another date that we initially agreed on.
I want to say that I will be ready to work for the company and will not let you down.
Looking forward to seeing your answer.
